project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement command-line interface for user input of the city name
Display the fetched weather information (temperature, humidity, weather conditions) in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and data parsing functionalities
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
